params._isSwapV2: Boolean to specify the version of the router; true means v2, false means v3.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._deadline: The unix timestamp after a swap will fail.
params._erc20TokenOrigin: ERC20 token address to swap for another.
params._payments: The array of the Payment data.
params._swaps: The array of the Swaps data.
params._totalAmountToSpend: Total amount of erc20TokenOrigin to spend in swaps.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._isSwapV2: Boolean to specify the version of the router; true means v2, false means v3.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

isSwapV2().notice: Returns if the contract is working with a v2 Uniswap protocol; true means v2, false means v3.

performSwapAndPayment(address,uint256,ui.notice: Perform the swap and the transfer to the given addresses.Currently the function only works with ERC20 tokens.

setSwapRouter(address,bool).notice: Set the SwapRouter and the version to be used.

swapRouter().notice: Returns the address of the Uniswap protocol router, it could be v2 or v3.

userdoc.notice: Swap and transfer multiple ERC20 pairs to multiple accounts in a single transaction. Use any router address of any DEX that uses Uniswap protocol v2 or v3 to make swaps.
